Detailed Description

Common interface for BTT, APS Rejection Table and other tables.

Microchip Corporation: http://www.microchip.com

Definition at line 43 of file sysDuplicateTable.h.

typedef struct _SYS_DuplicateTableEntry_t SYS_DuplicateTableEntry_t

Type of a duplicate rejection entry.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum _SysDuplicateTableAnswer_t

Enumeration of results of duplicate checking.

Enumerator:
SYS_DUPLICATE_TABLE_ANSWER_FOUND 

A packet with given sequence number has already been received.

SYS_DUPLICATE_TABLE_ANSWER_ADDED 

The received packet is not duplicate and it is added to the table.

SYS_DUPLICATE_TABLE_ANSWER_FULL 

Check can return Full only if removeOldest set to false

Definition at line 32 of file sysDuplicateTable.h.

Function Documentation

void SYS_DuplicateTableReset ( SYS_DuplicateTable_t *  table,
SYS_DuplicateTableEntry_t *  entries,
uint8_t  tableSize,
uint16_t  agingPeriod,
uint8_t  maxTTL,
bool  removeOldest,
uint8_t  maskSize 
)

Prepare duplicate table to real work.

Parameters:
[in]table- pointer to allocated table
[out]entries- pointer to array of entries
[in]tableSize- count of entries in table
[in]agingPeriod- aging period ms
[in]maxTTL- initial value of TTL.
[in]removeOldest- change behaviour on full table
Returns:
None.
SysDuplicateTableAnswer_t SYS_DuplicateTableCheck ( SYS_DuplicateTable_t *  table,
uint16_t  address,
uint8_t  seqNumber 
)

Search for record in table, add if not found.

Parameters:
[in]table- pointer to allocated table
[in]address,seqNumber- record to search for or to add if not found
Returns:
SYS_DUPLICATE_TABLE_ANSWER_FOUND - if duplicate packet is received SYS_DUPLICATE_TABLE_ANSWER_ADDED - new packet is received and information about the packet is added to the table. SYS_DUPLICATE_TABLE_ANSWER_FULL - there is no enough space in the table.
void SYS_DuplicateTableClear ( SYS_DuplicateTable_t *  table,
uint16_t  address,
uint8_t  seqNumber 
)

Clear info about given transaction from the rejection table.

Parameters:
[in]table- pointer to allocated table
[in]address,seqNumber- record to search for or to add if not found
Returns:
None.
bool SYS_DuplicateTableEntryExists ( SYS_DuplicateTable_t *  table,
uint16_t  address,
uint8_t  seqNumber 
)

Check for record existence in table, returns status.

Parameters:
[in]table- pointer to allocated table
[in]address,seqNumber- record to search for or to add if not found
Returns:
true - Record exists false - Record doesnt exist
